atk-s0403a37:1_0: 119-121. Ito paresu tapussoti dvevācikupāsako. Tathāgate niṭṭhaṅgatoti buddhaguṇesu
atk-s0403a37:1_1: patiṭṭhitacitto pahīnakaṅkho. Amataṁ addasāti amataddaso. Ariyenāti niddosena lokuttarasīlena.
atk-s0403a37:1_2: Ñāṇenāti paccavekkhaṇañāṇena. Vimuttiyāti sekhaphalavimuttiyā. Tavakaṇṇikoti evaṁnāmako
